title: General
fullText:
All test equipment shall be suitable for its intended purpose; in accordance with Clause 2.2.2; with regard to the environment in which it is intended to be used, e.g. damp or hazardous areas.
Measuring equipment (meters) shall comply with the relevant requirements of AS 61010.1 or the IEC 61557 series or an equivalent Standard.
See Appendix A for additional information for selecting and using test equipment.
